info.title: notifications
info.description: This app provides a backend and frontend for the notification API available in Nextcloud.

parameters.description: Version of the API to use

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

batchSetting.description: How often E-mails about missed notifications should be sent (hourly: 1; every three hours: 2; daily: 3; weekly: 4)

soundTalk.description: Enable sound for Talk notifications ('yes' or 'no')

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

post.summary: Generate a notification for a user (deprecated, use v3 instead)

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

post.summary: Generate a notification with rich object parameters for a user

subjectParameters.description: Rich objects to fill the subject placeholders, {@see \OCP\RichObjectStrings\Definitions}

messageParameters.description: Rich objects to fill the message placeholders, {@see \OCP\RichObjectStrings\Definitions}

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: Notification generated successfully, returned id is the notification ID for future delete requests

400.description: Provided data was invalid, check error field of the response of log file for details

post.summary: Update default notification settings for new users

soundTalk.description: Enable sound for Talk notifications ('yes' or 'no')
